marklogic.body: I am so to hear your comment. I was on many different anti-depressants before and no side effects. I took them for depression. I'm now on Lamictal for bipolor problems. II was taken Celaxa as my doctor felt I didn't need them for depression. I was also on abilify and that worked great but after I wasn't on anti-depressants any more I didn't feel I should be taking Abilify so doctor took me Off. No I have sever aniexty. I was put back on Celax for Anxiety disorder. I'm affraid I.ll have side effects and am scared of taking it. I took one yesterday and only had nausa. II'm afraid of Dry mouth and how long it will last. Any thoughts on this..
